TopicTitle: Can't right click parts in VAB

Articles.Content:
I recently encountered this problem and it has almost made me delete KSP. In the VAB, i can't right click on any parts at all but I can when i am in flight. I found out that TAC LS is causing the problem and it told me to install click through blocker and toolbar controller. I already had those but I installed it anyway, the 1.4.1 versions because thats the KSP version I have. I really wanted to use TAC LS but with this sh*t going on I can't. I'm getting really flipping annoyed and I really need help. Here is the ksp.log :    https://www.dropbox.com/s/um3aqt0ee4rowwe/KSP.log?dl=0

and here is the output.log:   https://www.dropbox.com/s/p9uzu7jmn0dgzuz/output_log.txt?dl=0

I recently encountered this problem and it has almost made me delete KSP. In the VAB, i can't right click on any parts at all but I can when i am in flight. I found out that TAC LS is causing the problem and it told me to install click through blocker and toolbar controller. I'm getting really flipping annoyed and I really need help. Here is the ksp.log :    https://www.dropbox.com/s/um3aqt0ee4rowwe/KSP.log?dl=0

and here is the output.log:   https://www.dropbox.com/s/p9uzu7jmn0dgzuz/output_log.txt?dl=0

Install the latest versions of those mods for 1.4.  Verify that you have the latest installed

36 minutes ago, linuxgurugamer said:

Install the latest versions of those mods for 1.4.  Verify that you have the latest installed

I just got CKAN and downloaded all the required versions of Clickthrough Blocker, Toolbar and TAC LS. I have started up KSP and i'll see if it works. (It takes half an hour to load btw). And I can't believe that the one and only linuxgurugamer replied to my post!

He is a really nice guy.

Anyway, good luck.
